Translations.Text: Tiandi de chuangzao, zhouye de lunliu, li ren hanghai de chuanbo, zhenzhu cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, jie ta er shi yi si de dadi fusheng, bing zai da dishang sanbu gezhong dongwu, yu fengxiang de gaibian, tiandi jian shouzhi de yun, duiyu neng liaojie de ren kan lai, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.

Youxie ren, zai zhenzhu zhi wai, bie you chongbai, dangzuo zhenzhu de pidi; tamen jing'ai naxie pidi, xiang jing'ai zhenzhu yiyang ──xindao de renmen, duiyu jing'ai zhenzhu, youwei kenzhi ──dang buyi de ren, kanjian xingfa de shihou, jiaruo tamen zhidao yiqie quanli dou shi zhenzhu de, zhenzhu shi xingfa yanli de…….
Dangshi, bei suicong de ren, kanjian xingfa, er yu suicong de ren juejiao, tamen bici jian de guanxi, dou duanjuele.

Suicong de ren, jiang shuo:`Dan yuan women de fan zhu shi, namo, women jiang yu tamen juejiao, youru tamen yu women juejiao yiyang.'Zhenzhu jiang zheyang yi tamen de xingwei zhaoshi tamen, shi tamen gandao huihen, tamen jue buneng tao chu huo yu.
Zhongren a! Nimen keyi chi da dishang suoyou hefa erqie jiamei de shiwu, nimen buyao suicong emo de bufa, ta que shi nimen de ming di.
Ta zhi yi zui'e he choushi mingling nimen, bing jiao nimen jiajie zhenzhu de mingyi, er shuo chu nimen suo bu zhidao de shi.
